abstract: This presentation describes Checkpoint, an integrated automated assessment system. The system manages both homework assignments and formal examinations based on a range of different question types, including questions requiring free-text answers. It supports an interactive authoring facility and provides a wide range of management and auditing facilities. It is currently being piloted with a cohort of 159 students on two first-year Java programming modules at the author's institution.
